\(\text{Вариант не выбран}\phantom{\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\left( 8n-1 \right)\left( 2n+3 \right)}{\left( 4n-6 \right)}}\)
\(\phantom{\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\mathrm{arctg}~n}{1+{{n}^{2}}}}\)
\(\phantom{\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,{{\left( \frac{3{{n}^{2}}+1}{2{{n}^{2}}+1} \right)}^{n}}}\)
\(\phantom{\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{3n-2}{{{6}^{n}}}}\)



\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\left( 8n-1 \right)\left( 2n+3 \right)}{\left( 4n-6 \right)\left( n+1 \right)}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\mathrm{arctg}~n}{1+{{n}^{2}}}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,{{\left( \frac{3{{n}^{2}}+1}{2{{n}^{2}}+1} \right)}^{n}}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{3n-2}{{{6}^{n}}}\)




\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\left( 3n-1 \right)\left( n+1 \right)}{n\left( 2n-1 \right)}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\mathrm{arctg}~{{n}^{3}}}{n\left( n+2 \right)\left( n+3 \right)}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,{{\left( \frac{2{{n}^{3}}+n}{3{{n}^{3}}11} \right)}^{n}}\)

\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\left( n+2 \right)\left( n+1 \right)}{4{{n}^{2}}}\)

\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{{{\cos }^{2}}n}{{{n}^{2}}+1}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,{{\left( \frac{2n+2}{5n+1} \right)}^{n}}\)
\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{{{7}^{n}}}{3n}\)




\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\left( 7n-1 \right)\left( 5n+1 \right)}{\left( n-2 \right)\left( n-1 \right)}\)

\(\displaystyle\underset{n=1}{\overset{\infty }{\mathop \sum }}\,\frac{\left( n-8 \right)\left( 3n+2 \right)}{5{{n}^{2}}}\)
